title: Bloomberg Markets: Vuori Growing in Athleisure Space
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Vuori Growing in Athleisure Space
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Joe Kudla Founder Vuori Discussing the activewear brand, born out of yoga class, that is seeing growth and retail expansion.
